title: Your house in order?
creator_credit: Philip Owtram, David Evans and Millbank Films
brief_description: Deals with a neglected subject - industrial housekeeping - and the accidents that can be attributed either directly or indirectly to bad housekeeping methods. It sets out to promote the right attitude of mind.
creator_credit_for_label: Philip Owtram, David Evans and Millbank Films
